co.uk.niadel.mpi.crafting

Class RecipesRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.uk.niadel.mpi.crafting.RecipesRegistry

  • public final class RecipesRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    Where to register your crafting and smelting recipes.
    Author:
    Niadel
